name: Counting Sheep
description:
I've listened to "Can't Wake Up" hundreds of times since it came out. It has kept me company in many relevant moments these past few months (or less, it came out pretty recently). I decided to make a game with some bits of Shakey Graves' music, be it lyrics, colors or imagery from the albums. This walking simulator is what has come out.


I made the art and programmed with Blueprints in Unreal Engine. It was intended for Epic's Summer Jam but didn't make it for a couple of hours. 

You can play with keyboard and gamepad but:

To talk, press key E or A button. I know it says B but it's A. 

B button on the gamepad is supposed to skip dialogues. 

Key P or start button on the gamepad for pause.

*shrug*
